meta.title: Pokedoku - The Ultimate Pokemon Puzzle Challenge
meta.description: Pokedoku is a daily Pokemon-themed puzzle game where you solve a 3x3 grid in 9 guesses. Created by Pokemon enthusiasts, it offers a unique twist for all Pokemon fans.

hero.title: Pokedoku
hero.subTitle: A Pokemon Puzzle Experience Like No Other

items.title: Daily Puzzle Challenge
items.description: Every day, players get a new 3x3 grid to solve, offering endless fun and fresh challenges.

items.title: Pokemon Knowledge Test
items.description: Pokedoku tests your knowledge of Pokemon types, regions, and special categories in a strategic grid-based format.

items.title: Multiple Correct Answers
items.description: Each cell in the grid can have multiple valid answers, making the game both challenging and flexible.

items.title: Created by Pokemon Fans
items.description: Developed by two passionate Pokemon enthusiasts, Pokedoku is a game by fans for fans, drawing inspiration from the popular Immaculate Grid.

items.text: Fill all nine boxes with the correct Pokemon based on the criteria provided for each row and column. You have nine guesses, and once a Pokemon is placed, it cannot be used again.
For example, if a box falls between the Fire and Fighting types, choose a Pokemon like Blaziken or Infernape that fits both categories.
Some columns may feature special categories like regions or legendary Pokemon, so select accordingly.
Remember, you cannot change your answers after submission, so think carefully about your choices.

items.question: What is Pokedoku?
items.answer: Pokedoku is a daily Pokemon-themed puzzle game that challenges players to fill a 3x3 grid with the correct Pokemon based on row and column criteria.

items.question: How do I play Pokedoku?
items.answer: You have nine guesses to fill the grid correctly. Be strategic, as once you place a Pokemon, it cannot be reused in the same puzzle.

items.question: What kind of categories appear in Pokedoku?
items.answer: Pokedoku features Pokemon type categories in the first two columns, and the third column may include regions, legendary Pokemon, or special categories.

items.question: Who created Pokedoku?
items.answer: Pokedoku was created by two Pokemon enthusiasts, Ryan and Joe, who were inspired by the Immaculate Grid and wanted to create a Pokemon-themed puzzle experience.
